```{r eval=FALSE}
ds_mpg %<>%
  mutate(plots = map2(data, pred, gg_foo))

ds_mpg %<>%
  mutate(
    plots = 
      pmap(       # Note that pmap() needs is data arguments supplied as a list()
        .l = list(
          data_orig = data, 
          data_pred = pred, 
          cyl = cyl
        ), 
        .f = gg_foo
      )
  ) 
```
